code: import React from'react';import{Camera,Sparkles}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoadingIndicator=_ref=>{let{message,progress}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center py-12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative mb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-100 to-primary-200 p-4 rounded-2xl inline-block animate-pulse-slow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Camera,{className:"h-12 w-12 text-primary-600"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute -top-1 -right-1 bg-yellow-400 rounded-full p-1.5 animate-bounce",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sparkles,{className:"h-3 w-3 text-yellow-900"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 mb-3",children:message}),progress!==undefined&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full max-w-xs mx-auto mb-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-full bg-gray-200 rounded-full h-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-500 to-primary-600 h-2 rounded-full transition-all duration-500",style:{width:`${progress}%`}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-xs text-gray-500 mt-2",children:[progress,"% complete"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-center space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-2 h-2 bg-primary-500 rounded-full animate-bounce"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-2 h-2 bg-primary-500 rounded-full animate-bounce",style:{animationDelay:'0.1s'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-2 h-2 bg-primary-500 rounded-full animate-bounce",style:{animationDelay:'0.2s'}})]})]});};export default LoadingIndicator;
